title: Enjoy Your  Balcony Plus the Upgrades!
map_address: 39670 Greenview Pl near Ann Arbor Rd, Ann Arbor Tr
posting_body: Schedule a tour and apply to reserve your next apartment home!
Available TODAY!

It's on a top floor welcoming you to your balcony, a galley style kitchen with granite countertops, new cabinets, wood vinyl floors, plush carpet, and bathroom upgraded with curved shower rod, ceramic tiles and floors!
Twin Arbors is conveniently located right next to I-275, providing an easy commute to metro Detroit's major commercial and cultural centers, along with Plymouth's historic downtown.
Plymouth offers wonderful options for schools, along with a beautiful and relaxing environment nestled in a quiet subdivision.
With some of the most exceptional amenities in the greater Detroit area, Twin Arbors provides the most premier living environment!
All 19 buildings have secured entry doors and a lower level that features coin-operated laundry and additional storage for each apartment!
Each apartment is a very spacious corner unit with a lot of natural light!
You will have plenty of storage space throughout the home and all of your appliances do come with in your galley style kitchen!
You will have access to our 24-hour fitness center with machines all brand new, a 40+ miles bike and walking trail and our seasonal outdoor swimming pool with a sundeck!
Residents are responsible for the 3 main utilities- water, gas and electric.
Twin Arbors is pet friendly, allowing 2 pets per home and only breed restrictions apply!
We offer flexible lease terms ranging from 2 to 15 months and furnished units are an option!
Contact us at
